body.name: EUKI Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Door Mount, Compatible with Video 4/3/3 Plus/2/1, No-Drill Fit for Most Holder for Apartment, Bracket
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 36 mins
features: EXCLUSIVE DESIGN: EUKI Anti-theft doorbell door mount is designed for most brand video doorbells, is made of steel and hard plastic. This anti-theft mount for doorbell can wrap your video doorbell. Aiming to offer a renter-friendly doorbell accessory, protecting your expensive video doorbell away steal.

COMPATIBLE DOORBELLS: Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell 1, 2, 3, 3 Plus & 4,b link, Eufy, Arlo, AOSU, XTU, EUKI and the most popular non-wired video doorbells which width between 1.5" and 2.5", and the length between 3.5" and 5.5". Please measuring your doorbell size before purchase.

CHECK DOOR SIZE BEFORE ORDER: This no-drill mounting bracket is special friendly for those who live in apartments, dorms, rentals, and hotels. Your door thickness must be between 0.9 inches and 1.8 inches. Between door and door frame distance must be more than 0.2 inch. (tips: the door must be swing inward)

NO-DRILL & EASY INSTALLATION: Put your video doorbell and foam in the shall, tighten the screws, mount on the door side. Then fixed it on the door via the adjusting screw. It Does not need a drill door or wall, will not change anything after mount it.

100% SUPPORT & WARRANTY: We provide a warranty for our customers. If this Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Door Mount fails to meet your expectations, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or suggestions about this product, and we will try our best to solve the problem.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EUKI Anti-theft Video Doorbell Door Mount (Doorbell not include) No-Drill Mount, to prevent your expensive doorbell from being stolen and also won't damage your property. Made of premium metal and hard ABS. Lightweight and convenient design allows you to move at any time. Also easily remove your video doorbell to charge the battery without having to unscrew your video doorbell from the wall.

Apartment Door Mount Compatible with More Video Doorbells Compatible with non-wired Doorbell Ring 1, 2, 3 & Plus, Eufy, Blink, Arlo, AOSU, XTU J7 J9 J10, EUKI J7 J9 J10 and other brands that are maximum of 2.9 inches wide x 5.6 inches tall x 1.4 inches depth.

Package included: Front Container Bracket - Hard ABS Back Mount - Metal Sturdy Sponge for Video Doorbell Screws FIRM Foam Screwdriver Round Foam Sticker with Back Adhesive (for stick to anywhere you want to protect the door from scratch) Tips: If the foam is not enough to support your doorbell, you can use scissors to fold the firm foam in half and cut it into two pieces and use it. Some security doors or doors with uneven frames are not suitable for this kind of doorbell bracket. Please check the door type carefully before buying. The door must be swing inward, most fit for video doorbell mount. not fit for wide doorbells. Fit for Door Thickness: From 0.9 inches to 1.8 inches. Between door and door frame distance must be more than 0.2 inches. Please be sure to measure your door before buying.

How to Install? Note: After fully charging your video doorbell, connecting it to your WiFi network, then you are ready to begin. STEP 1: Place your video doorbell system faces down inside the container. Use included foam stuff on the sides and behind the doorbell to secure it in place. PS: If the foam is not enough to support your doorbell, you can use scissors to fold the firm foam in half and cut it into two pieces and use it. STEP 2: Slide the inner bracket into the container's bracket under the container's edge securing the video doorbell inside. STEP 3: Put the doorbell door mount onto the ideal fixing place, tighten the screw with a screwdriver, fix it on the door, and done. PLEASE DON'T move the doorbell mount after fixing it. PLEASE DON'T tighten too hard, or the metal back mount will bend then the door can't close fit. Video Doorbell Door Mount for Apartments, Hotel Stays, Rental, Dorms, and More.

reviews.reviewerName: I literally bought this blink video door bell to se what’s going on around me for safety but to my surprise, Live view won’t work, can’t access live view, Camera and Video quality too poor, blurry and turned out all grey. I am so disappointed. I am returning it. I literally bought this blink video door bell to se what’s going on around me for safety but to my surprise, Live view won’t work, can’t access live view, Camera and Video quality too poor, blurry and turned out all grey. I am so disappointed. I am returning it.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EUKI ANT-THEFT VIDEO DOORBELL MOUNT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Good Investment
reviews.reviewText: It's bulky but I like how intimidating it looks on my door. I find it a bit inconvenient to stuff foam pads to make my camera fit properly but I guess the product is opting for a diverse market of cameras. The installation and removal is simple. Overall, worth the investment against theft and vandalization.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it but had to return
reviews.reviewText: This is definitely a great product! It was easy to install..ones reviewer said for you to use foam become it's still loose and I listened and bought some block foam from Amazon (I bought the wrong one lol). I'm returning it because it was a little too big for the kind of door I have and wasn't able to put it down any further because I have something of a blocker on my NYCA door. Other than that, I highly recommend this product! It didn't block the motion sensor at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this mount to fit the Ring 2 on an apartment door. I didn’t want a mount that needed to be drilled onto the door. It fits. It was easy to set up and mount. I added some more foam inside the back to make sure the Ring device didn’t move around inside (that’s the green you may see inside the mount- in the video clip; it was a nail file thing, lol}.The mount could be slid up and down the door if pushed hard enough, that’s why I placed it right above a lock to prevent it from being pushed down. But it cannot be removed from the door while outside, unless someone has a hatchet or something; so it is anti-theft. This is day 2, and the Ring 2 is working just fine. So far so Good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for apartments or rentals. Stayed in place. Very sturdy!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It claims to be renter friendly and won’t ruin the door… it will.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT fit Arlo
reviews.reviewText: This is pretty solid and well-made, and is not hard to mount on the door, but it does not fit Arlo, even though the description says it does. We had to cut the opening bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: This was recommended to me and I’m so completely satisfied with it. The installation process was easy. Instructions were easy. It came with everything that you needed to mount your ring camera. It has small pieces of foam cutouts that you will need to keep your ring positioned securely so that it’s not moving around. Just open the device, place your ring camera inside, add the foam cutouts, replace the back, screw the screws into the backing of the item, and then place on your door by tightening it securely to your door, and that’s it. It doesn’t budge. Completely secured. This is great for apartments or places where you cannot drill it into the wall. This is such an inexpensive item that works so well. Highly, highly recommend!
